# SampleConfs - Available Config Files

Complete reference for all config template files in `SampleConfs/` folder (3385996759/SampleConfs/).

This documentation has been organized into category-based files for easier navigation. Click on any category below to view detailed file listings.

## üìÅ Categories

### [Character & Attributes](./01-SampleConfs-Character.md)
Config files for character stats, abilities, appellations, fate features, and character actions.
- 50+ files including ability points, character grades, role actions, and behaviors

### [Items & Equipment](./02-SampleConfs-Items.md)
Config files for artifacts, equipment, consumables, and inventory systems.
- 50+ files including artifact shapes, item types, clothing, and rings

### [Battle & Skills](./03-SampleConfs-Battle.md)
Config files for combat systems, skills, abilities, and battle mechanics.
- 150+ files including battle skills, effects, trails, abilities, and units

### [World & Areas](./04-SampleConfs-World.md)
Config files for world map, dungeons, terrain, and exploration.
- 80+ files including dungeon configs, world blocks, monster areas, and villages

### [Schools & Organizations](./05-SampleConfs-Schools.md)
Config files for sect/school systems, buildings, tasks, and management.
- 100+ files including school buildings, tasks, wars, inheritance, and pets

### [NPCs & Dialogues](./06-SampleConfs-NPCs.md)
Config files for NPC definitions, drama system, and character interactions.
- 30+ files including NPC base stats, drama dialogues, and initialization

### [Tasks & Quests](./07-SampleConfs-Tasks.md)
Config files for task and quest systems.
- 40+ files including task definitions and levels

### [Towns & Markets](./08-SampleConfs-Towns.md)
Config files for towns, markets, commerce, and services.
- 30+ files including markets, auctions, hotels, and town buildings

### [Advanced Systems](./09-SampleConfs-Advanced.md)
Config files for cultivation, alchemy, geomancy, pets, and special systems.
- 150+ files including immortal methods, pill crafting, potmons, and special events

### [DLC Content](./10-SampleConfs-DLC.md)
Config files for downloadable content and expansions.
- 200+ DLC-prefixed files for expansion features

### [Game System](./11-SampleConfs-System.md)
Config files for core game systems, controls, and technical settings.
- 30+ files including input handling, difficulty, UI, and weather

### [Mod System](./12-SampleConfs-Mod.md)
Config files specific to the modding framework.
- 10+ files including mod conditions, functions, and tags
---

**Total:** 800+ config template files across 12 categories

## üìñ Usage

Each category file contains:
- File name listings with descriptions (where applicable)
- Organized subsections for easier navigation
- File counts for quick reference

## üîç Finding Config Files

1. **Browse by category** - Click on category links above
2. **Search within categories** - Use Ctrl+F in individual category files
3. **Check file locations** - All configs are in `3385996759/SampleConfs/`

## üí° Tips

- Reference these templates when creating custom mod configurations
- Copy sample files from `SampleConfs/` to your mod's `ModConf/` folder
- Follow the structure shown in sample files for best results
- Check instruction files in `.github/instructions/` for detailed guidance All files follow the game's original structure and can be used as templates for creating custom mod configs.
